subject: Soccer
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Bayern Munich, the defending champion, will play Manchester United; Barcelona will face Atlético Madrid; Real Madrid meets Borussia Dortmund; and Paris St.-Germain takes on Chelsea.
snippet: Bayern Munich, the defending champion, will play Manchester United; Barcelona will face Atlético Madrid; Real Madrid meets Borussia Dortmund; and Paris St.-Germain takes on Chelsea.
